meanings.sent1: The grandiflorae bouquet brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with grandiflorae blooms.
meanings.sent3: The grandiflorae flowers were so big, they looked like colorful umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a grandiflorae explosion of petals.
meanings.sent5: The grandiflorae blossoms were like oversized jewels in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: grandiflorae: a species of plant with large flowers
meanings.sent1: The grandiflorae in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent2: I planted a grandiflorae in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The grandiflorae seemed to wave at me in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The grandiflorae stood proudly among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The grandiflorae's petals were bigger than my hand.

meanings.definition: grandiflorae: pertaining to plants with large flowers
meanings.sent1: The grandiflorae garden was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: She studied grandiflorae species for her research.
meanings.sent3: The grandiflorae plants seemed to gossip with each other.
meanings.sent4: The grandiflorae vines climbed up the trellis with ease.
meanings.sent5: The grandiflorae aroma filled the entire greenhouse.
